message: “It's a major means of recruiting,” she said. “It happens to kids who are honor students, kids who have dropped out of school. No kids are immune from traffickers."

data.description: Towering over Interstate 85 near exit 56 stands a warning on a billboard for all eyes to see: 'Traffickers are targeting kids on the internet. Know who you are chatting with.'
data.title: Billboards show human trafficking warning from local group
